backend/main.mo: Defines canister state, entity types, maps, counters, and helper authorization/validation functions for maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitors, users, and notifications.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for deployment‑retry and troubleshooting improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and configuration assets.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting optional canonical app URL configuration for IC deployment and PWA behavior.
frontend/deploy/ic-deploy-with-retry.sh: Shell script wrapping dfx deploy with retries, cycles/identity checks, optional canister pre‑creation, and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/deploy/ic-precreate-canisters.s: Script that pre‑creates backend and frontend canisters on IC mainnet to avoid reservation errors before deployment.
frontend/deploy/README.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions for deploying the app to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Troubleshooting guide covering common IC deployment failures, readiness checks, and manual verification commands.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme values, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with startup loader, redirect logic for ic0.app URLs, and fallback error handling.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker managing caching strategy, offline behavior, and cache versioning for app assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app bootstrap handling authentication, profile loading, role-based routing, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/FatalStartupErro: UI component that displays a fatal startup error with reload and hard-reload options.
frontend/src/components/FlatNumberPicker: Interactive flat number input with validation, increment/decrement controls, and selectable popover list.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, header logic, PWA install handling, and logout flow.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Dashboard card component with icon, title, optional description, variant styling, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a user profile including name, role selection, and optional flat number.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateCard.t: Reusable card component that renders loading, error, empty, or content states with optional retry and titles.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches early startup errors and displays a fatal error screen.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Full‑screen error UI offering retry, logout, and hard reload actions with optional error details.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides actor and fetching state from useActor via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages backend actors based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorContext.ts: Utility hook to access the ActorContext and enforce provider usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Hook that captures the beforeinstallprompt event and exposes installability and install prompt logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profiles, maintenance records, notices, payments, and related actor-driven backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode settings, mobile tweaks, and print-specific CSS rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: Implements a password change form with validation, mutation handling, and logout flow after successful update.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticeDetailPa: Displays detailed information for a single notice, including title, message, and expiry date.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticesPage.ts: Lists all notices with sorting, secretary-only CSV/print actions, and navigation to details or creation.
frontend/src/pages/common/NotificationsP: Displays user notifications, allows marking individual or all notifications as read, and organizes them into unread and read sections.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintDetailP: Shows detailed information for a specific complaint, including status, description, priority, and resolution note.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintsPage.t: Lets users lodge new complaints and view a list of their existing complaints with status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ExpendituresPage: Placeholder page explaining that expenditure tracking is not yet supported by the backend.
frontend/src/pages/flat/FlatDashboardPag: Provides a dashboard with quick-access cards for maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitor requests, and profile management.
Allows users to view maintenance dues, record payments via UPI, and check payment status for selected months and years.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ProfilePage.tsx: Enables users to manage up to four mobile numbers associated with their flat for visitor approval notifications.
frontend/src/pages/flat/VisitorRequestsP: Displays visitor requests for a resident’s flat, allowing approval or decline with flat-number validation.
frontend/src/pages/guard/GuardDashboardP: Guard dashboard showing pending visitor requests and navigation to request creation and notices.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestC: Form for guards to create visitor requests, fetch flat owner contacts, and open WhatsApp with a prefilled message.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestD: Shows full details of a specific visitor request with status and flat information.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequests: Lists all visitor requests for guards with sorting, status badges, and navigation to request details or creation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the Internet Identity login UI with error handling and optional custom logo loading.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsA: Admin page for viewing, exporting, and printing all resident complaints with status counts.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsR: Print-optimized page rendering all complaints in a table and auto-triggering print when loaded.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/components/: Provides skeleton placeholders for the settings page while data loads, including logo and configuration sections.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/CreateNotic: Form page for creating a notice with optional expiry date and submitting via createNotice mutation.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/Expenditure: Admin page to view, add, edit, and save monthly expenditure items, with CSV export and print options.
Print-friendly view of a month's expenditure report, auto-triggering print after data loads.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/NoticesRepo: Print page listing all notices with ID, title, message, and expiry, sorted by newest first.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/OverduePage: Displays overdue flats for a selected month and year with period selection and reminder rules.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsPag: Management page showing payment status for all flats with CSV export and print options.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsRep: Print-friendly report of flat payment statuses for a selected period, including counts and details.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SecretaryDa: Renders the secretary dashboard with navigation cards for payments, overdue flats, expenditures, complaints, notices, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SettingsPag: Implements the secretary settings UI with logo upload, form state, validation, and update logic using queries and mutations.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrl.ts: Utility functions for handling canonical URLs, redirects, base paths, and URL construction.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: CSV utilities for escaping fields, generating CSV content, and triggering downloads.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date helpers for current month/year, formatting timestamps, listing months, and generating a year range.
frontend/src/utils/flatNumbers.ts: Manages valid society flat numbers with generation, validation, formatting, and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/hardReload.ts: Performs a hard reload by clearing caches, unregistering service workers, and reloading the page.
frontend/src/utils/overdue.ts: Determines whether the current date is in the overdue period and whether to show overdue notices.
frontend/src/utils/print.ts: Provides helpers to open a print view and trigger the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/sanitizeError.ts: Cleans and formats error messages by removing sensitive data and producing user-safe output.
frontend/src/utils/settingsValidation.ts: Validation and normalization helpers for secretary settings fields, including maintenance amount, UPI ID, and guard number.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Generates a UPI payment deep link using an ID, amount, and note.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep link by cleaning the phone number and encoding a message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
frontend/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions extending Vite environment variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and existing feature requirements.
